import React from 'react' import s from './Users.module.css' import userPhoto from '../../assets/img/1521018917.png' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Paginator from './Paginator' const Users = (props) => { let pagesCount = Math.ceil(props.totalUsersCount / props.pageSize) let pages = []; for (let i = 1; i <= pagesCount; i++) { pages.push(i); } return
{ props.users.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status}
) }
} export default Users
